data.name: CreateProcedureDequeueMessage
CreateQueue
CreateTriggerEnqueueMessage
CreateTypeMessage
data.value: CREATE TYPE TYPE_{0} AS OBJECT (MESSAGE_TYPE VARCHAR2(50), MESSAGE_CONTENT XMLType);

data.name: ScriptDropAll
ScriptJobCreate
data.value:
BEGIN DBMS_SCHEDULER.CREATE_JOB( JOB_NAME => 'JOB_{0}', JOB_TYPE => 'PLSQL_BLOCK', JOB_ACTION => '{2}', START_DATE => SYSTIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '{1}' MINUTE, END_DATE => NULL, ENABLED => FALSE, AUTO_DROP => TRUE);
DBMS_SCHEDULER.SET_ATTRIBUTE( NAME => 'JOB_{0}', ATTRIBUTE => 'restartable', VALUE => TRUE); END;

data.name: ScriptJobEnable
